comments:
There is something wrong with the set-up config. The following code you wrote is wrong.
EngineConfig config = new EngineConfig();
                        config.setEngineHome(
                                        "C:/Program
Files/Eclipse/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.birt.report.engine_2.0.0");
The engine home must be "C:/Program
Files/Eclipse/eclipse". Then BIRT will search the extensions in the Engine_Home + "/plugins" package. Here Engine_Home is the value you set.
